BECOME A DEVELOPER IN 9 WEEKS

MORE INFO

DEV CAMP

A developer bootcamp is an intense program where you start from the web programming basics to build a portfolio of projects using technologies like Python-Django, HTML5, CSS3, Postgresql, Mongodb, Javascript among others.
This is a hands-on course that require a lot of effort and dedication, beyond technologies you will be introduced to computer science subjects and practices.

THE PROGRAM

METHODOLOGY

The program is part online part onsite, however the time dedication/intensity is at least 8 hours a day, you will have two classes every day, also pairing time where you will be able to work in the weekly projects and receive feedback, collaboration

CONTENTS

  • Typical Development enviroment
  • Web development - Front End
  • Web development - Back End
  • Deploying web applications
  • Testing - Debugging
  • Real time web
  • Resources Management

HIRING

We are not only preparing you with the skills to be a web developer but also introducing you to companies looking for developers with the just adquired skills and willing to hire entry level developers (We do not guarantee a job position but try very hard to get you one).

COMPANIES

These are the actively hiring companies that are alredy going to be introduced to our students

UPCOMING BOOTCAMPS

  • DJANGO WEB DEVELOPER

    APRIL 1ST - JUNE 30TH

    Become a Django web developer in 12 weeks, get a portfolio done, and get introduced to companies looking for these skills
